SELECT pipelines.id AS pipelineid, `key` AS key, value AS value FROM properties INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = properties.buildId AND builds.name = #build# INNER JOIN stages ON stages.id = builds.stageId AND stages.name = #stage# INNER JOIN pipelines ON pipelines.id = stages.pipelineId AND pipelines.name = #pipeline# AND pipelines.id <= #maxId# AND pipelines.id >= #minId#
`key` = #propertyName#
